headline: 2 Stocks Down 58% and 30% to Buy Right Now
summary: Paycom stock is still reeling from its revenue slowdown.  The stock market is carving out new all-time highs, but some individual stocks have yet to fully recover.  Both companies face risks, but solid growth stories make Reddit and Paycom attractive stocks.
